directors: ['jerome robbins', 'robert wise', 'natalie wood', 'george chakiris', 'richard beymer', 'russ tamblyn']

name: sabrina
plot: a playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.

name: rebel without a cause
plot: a rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

name: dangerous liaisons
plot: a scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

name: the long good friday
plot: an up-and-coming gangster is tested by the insurgence of an unknown, very powerful threat.

name: match point
plot: at a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.
directors: ['woody allen', 'scarlett johansson', 'jonathan rhys meyers', 'emily mortimer', 'matthew goode']

name: drive my car
plot: a renowned stage actor and director learns to cope with a big personal loss when he receives an offer to direct a production of uncle vanya in hiroshima.

name: murmur of the heart
plot: as france is nearing the end of the first indochina war, an open-minded teenage boy finds himself torn between a rebellious urge to discover love, and the ever-present, almost dominating affection of his beloved mother.

name: gettysburg
plot: in 1863, the northern and southern forces fight at gettysburg in the decisive battle of the american civil war.

name: the naked gun: from the files of police squad!
plot: incompetent police detective frank drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate queen elizabeth ii.

plot: a mentally handicapped man fights for custody of his 7-year-old daughter and in the process teaches his cold-hearted lawyer the value of love and family.

plot: spring. yorkshire. young farmer johnny saxby numbs his daily frustrations with binge drinking and casual sex, until the arrival of a romanian migrant worker for lambing season ignites an intense relationship that sets johnny on a new path.

name: the last king of scotland
plot: based on the events of the brutal ugandan dictator idi amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s.
inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.
directors: ['jonathan levine', 'joseph gordon-levitt', 'seth rogen', 'anna kendrick', 'bryce dallas howard']

name: jeremiah johnson
plot: a mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.

name: freedom writers
plot: a young teacher inspires her class of at-risk students to learn tolerance, apply themselves and pursue education beyond high school.

name: the secret world of arrietty
plot: the clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. life changes for the clocks when their teenage daughter arrietty is discovered.

name: blood simple
plot: the owner of a seedy small-town texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. a chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies, and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered.
directors: ['joel coen', 'ethan coen', 'john getz', 'frances mcdormand', 'dan hedaya', 'm. emmet walsh']
stars: ['ethan coen', 'john getz', 'frances mcdormand', 'dan hedaya', 'm. emmet walsh']

name: the bridges of madison county
plot: photographer robert kincaid wanders into the life of housewife francesca johnson for four days in the 1960s.

name: 21 grams
plot: a freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.
directors: ['alejandro g. iñárritu', 'sean penn', 'benicio del toro', 'naomi watts', 'danny huston']

name: three colors: white

name: planes, trains & automobiles
plot: a chicago advertising man must struggle to travel home from new york for thanksgiving, with a lovable oaf of a shower-curtain-ring salesman as his only companion.

plot: the borg travel back in time intent on preventing earth's first contact with an alien species. captain picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that zefram cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.

plot: the true story of the taj hotel terrorist attack in mumbai. hotel staff risk their lives to keep everyone safe as people make unthinkable sacrifices to protect themselves and their families.

directors: ['santiago mitre', 'ricardo darín', 'gina mastronicola', 'francisco bertín', 'santiago armas estevarena']

name: shane

directors: ['george stevens', 'alan ladd', 'jean arthur', 'van heflin', 'brandon de wilde']

name: dead man's shoes
plot: a disaffected soldier returns to his hometown to get even with the thugs who brutalized his mentally-challenged brother years ago.

name: seven pounds
plot: a man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.

name: the commitments
plot: jimmy rabbitte, an unemployed dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the irish working class.
directors: ['alan parker', 'robert arkins', 'michael aherne', 'angeline ball', 'maria doyle kennedy']

name: the swimmer
plot: a man spends a summer day swimming as many pools as he can all over a quiet suburban town.
directors: ['frank perry', 'sydney pollack', 'burt lancaster', 'janet landgard', 'janice rule', 'tony bickley']

name: on golden pond
plot: norman is a curmudgeon with an estranged relationship with his daughter chelsea. at golden pond, he and his wife nevertheless agree to care for billy, the son of chelsea's new boyfriend, and a most unexpected relationship blooms.

plot: a detective searches for the body of a femme fatale which has gone missing from a morgue.

plot: against all the odds, a thirteen-year-old boy in malawi invents an unconventional way to save his family and village from famine.

name: victor/victoria
plot: a struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.

plot: cornered by the dea, convicted new york drug dealer montgomery brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.
directors: ['spike lee', 'edward norton', 'barry pepper', 'philip seymour hoffman', 'rosario dawson']

name: nashville
plot: over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political convention.

name: walkabout
plot: two city-bred siblings are stranded in the australian outback, where they learn to survive with the aid of an aboriginal boy on his "walkabout": a ritual separation from his tribe.

name: barton fink
plot: a renowned new york playwright is enticed to california to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of hollywood.
directors: ['joel coen', 'ethan coen', 'john turturro', 'john goodman', 'judy davis', 'michael lerner']

name: united 93
plot: a real-time account of the events on united flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on september 11th, 2001 that crashed near shanksville, pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.

name: the hurricane

directors: ['norman jewison', 'denzel washington', 'vicellous shannon', 'deborah kara unger', 'liev schreiber']

name: better days
plot: a bullied teenage girl forms an unlikely friendship with a mysterious young man who protects her from her assailants, all while she copes with the pressures of her final examinations.

name: jeanne dielman, 23, quai du commerce, 1080 bruxelles
plot: a lonely widowed housewife does her daily chores, takes care of her apartment where she lives with her teenage son, and turns the occasional trick to make ends meet. however, something happens that changes her safe routine.

name: weekend

name: mister roberts
plot: in the waning days of world war ii, the cargo officer of a navy supply ship chafes at its role far from the action in the pacific's backwater areas, his frustration rising when its captain denies the crew liberty over petty irritations.
directors: ['john ford', 'mervyn leroy', 'joshua logan', 'henry fonda', 'james cagney', 'william powell', 'jack lemmon']
stars: ['mervyn leroy', 'joshua logan', 'henry fonda', 'james cagney', 'william powell', 'jack lemmon']

name: 3:10 to yuma
plot: broke small-time rancher dan evans is hired by the stagecoach line to put big-time captured outlaw leader ben wade on the 3:10 train to yuma but wade's gang tries to free him.

plot: sara is sent to a strict boarding school after her father enlists in wwi. when he is presumed dead, the headmistress, knowing she will not receive any more money, forces the girl to become a servant.

plot: after her death, a mother returns to her home town in order to fix the situations she couldn't resolve during her life.

name: seconds
plot: an unhappy middle-aged banker agrees to a procedure that will fake his death and give him a completely new look and identity - one that comes with its own price.

plot: a small-time gambler hired to work in a buenos aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.

plot: a legendary dhampir competes with a motley family of bounty hunters to return a young woman, who has been seemingly abducted by a vampire, to her family.

name: ludo

name: lupin iii: the castle of cagliostro

name: mrs. miniver

name: the public enemy

stars: ['fred fleck', 'robert wise', 'tim holt', 'joseph cotten', 'dolores costello', 'anne baxter']
